welcome_message_body: Welcome to sunny Sarasota, where the beaches are pristine, the arts scene is vibrant, and the people are friendly. Get ready to immerse yourself in our city's charm and experience all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sarasota/Bradenton International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for domestic flights operated by major airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves as the international terminal, with flights to and from various countries.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Venice Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Venice Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: Whitted Airport's main terminal offers domestic flights to popular destinations within the United States.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: Whitted Airport does not currently have an international terminal.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
